name: Web Responsive
overview: Web Responsive creates anything from simple CMS websites to full-blooded enterprise applications. Here we present a few of our solutions: CMS - Content Management Systems We use the biggest and most functional open source CMS frameworks to provide working and cheap solutions. This means you get a solution for the future, that you can easily maintain, update and expand to meet your growing business needs. E-Commerce We have the experience to set up a working online shop for your company using reliable open source E-Commerce solutions. In a short timeframe and for a relatively low price you have your new webshop up-and-running. Community Solutions Our Internet solutions for the future are based on community integration. The community integration gives a base for collaboration with your customers for joint value creation. In short, the solution to: â€œIf only we knew what our customers knowâ€. Enterprise Business Applications We have the knowledge and expertise to engineer scalable, reliable enterprise business applications with powerful features like enhanced security, live messaging channels, web service integration and much more. A customized solution that solves your business goals. SEO - Search Engine Optimization We can provide you with coaching and improvement in Search Engine Optimization for your website. Furthermore we can install free web site analytical and statistical tools, so you can measure and optimize the success of your website.
